name: The annoying fly
description:
!Note this is a very small game compared to many other of the games you might play for this jam (i had school)

You Play as a Small fly And your job is to bug the humans. 

controls W = Fly up, S = Fly down, A = Fly left, D = fly right, Space = fly forward

Sir back and enjoy this buggy game about a bug who bugs humans

https://github.com/JonasWami/The-annoying-bug
